messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Sitting on the beach up North
messages.msgSnippet: Beach party??? did I hear someone say BEACH PARTY??? I m all for it!! Kristen ... From: tmthomas@shaw.ca To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com Sent: Thursday,
messages.messageBody:
Beach party??? did I hear someone say BEACH PARTY???

I'm all for it!!

Kristen
----- Original Message -----
From: tmthomas@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, June 12, 2003 4:43 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Sitting on the beach up North


Point taken! :O))


hehe....I've done the Northern beaches most of my life Tim!! Hence my love
for the WARM water, crystal white sand, dolphins etc.....
This is the beach life where you actually get in the water, not just sit and
enjoy the scenery or explore the beach only. I have many fond memories of the
Oregon beaches and I get to hang on the Alaskan beaches almost every year.
This girl thinks the Gulf is a LOT more fun for a beach party, thank you. :)

Ren


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
